channel.title: Matrix shop wont buy
channel.description: just wont buy, opens shop doesnt buy or anything

item.title: Matrix shop wont buy
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:5, topic:449557”][quote author=PvP Bobby link=topic=552454.msg4048646#msg4048646 date=1342293163]

nothing sells and everything is worth 0 gp also. if you didnt know that…

but i need this too.

Shops.java is missing the buy and sell methods, heads up to the both of you.

Actually it isn’t… The interface handling for buying/selling at the shops is using the old interfaces from previous Matrix versions (711?). You need to go in and change up the interface handling to work with the new Shops. Not sure if it is an anti-leech or maybe they never got around to working with shops – or hell maybe I am wrong all together. But Shops.java isn’t missing the buy/sell functions. They are there.
[/quote]

Wow haha, I just went back and found them. My bad; also, I knew something was up with the interfaces. But what I think happened is when Dragonkk went to got steal the most up-to-date version of Matrix from his developer, he must’ve not gotten the most up-to-date Matrix source lol. Since in the actual Matrix being hosted, the shops interface does work.[/quote]

Are you sure that the Matrix interfaces worked when they were hosting it? I just fixed the shop interfaces and it works almost flawlessly – I can’t be fucked to set up all the interface buttons and shit right now. And I looked at the RSPS that the Matrix website redirects you to now and it uses the Matrix base but it is a spawn server and shops are also broken in that one.

Anyway. I fixed the shops you just need to fix up the Shop.java and send the correct configuration for the Shop interface. I might make a post about it if someone hasn’t already.

Read full topic

Yep… its actually in button handler… where all the buttons needed to be coded to do their part of the interface… sum1 is going to have to go on runescape posibly and get the ids… if their shop interface is the same o.O

item.title: Matrix shop wont buy
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“PvP Bobby, post:4, topic:449557”][quote author=DannyIsSoPro link=topic=552454.msg4048157#msg4048157 date=1342245510]

nothing sells and everything is worth 0 gp also. if you didnt know that…

but i need this too.

Shops.java is missing the buy and sell methods, heads up to the both of you.
[/quote]

Actually it isn’t… The interface handling for buying/selling at the shops is using the old interfaces from previous Matrix versions (711?). You need to go in and change up the interface handling to work with the new Shops. Not sure if it is an anti-leech or maybe they never got around to working with shops – or hell maybe I am wrong all together. But Shops.java isn’t missing the buy/sell functions. They are there.[/quote]

Wow haha, I just went back and found them. My bad; also, I knew something was up with the interfaces. But what I think happened is when Dragonkk went to got steal the most up-to-date version of Matrix from his developer, he must’ve not gotten the most up-to-date Matrix source lol. Since in the actual Matrix being hosted, the shops interface does work.

item.title: Matrix shop wont buy

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:3, topic:449557”][quote author=kingcobra805 link=topic=552454.msg4047954#msg4047954 date=1342230202]
nothing sells and everything is worth 0 gp also. if you didnt know that…

but i need this too.
[/quote]

Shops.java is missing the buy and sell methods, heads up to the both of you.[/quote]

Actually it isn’t… The interface handling for buying/selling at the shops is using the old interfaces from previous Matrix versions (711?). You need to go in and change up the interface handling to work with the new Shops. Not sure if it is an anti-leech or maybe they never got around to working with shops – or hell maybe I am wrong all together. But Shops.java isn’t missing the buy/sell functions. They are there.
